5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Wa’il bin Hujr said:“I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) performing prayer, and he took hold of his left hand with his right.”

chapter.ara-name: باب وَضْعِ الْيَمِينِ عَلَى الشِّمَالِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Placing the right hand on the left during Prayer
